posts.html:
Men come to Barber Avenue not only to get a great hair cut, but also to relax and have fun. It's a place to talk about your projets, your ambitions and to connect with other ambitious person like you.

Telephone: 514-401-1111

Stylists

Description Price
Shaving $15
Mens hair cut $35
Shampoo $10
15 min head message $40
Organic hair color $70
Young boys (15 y/o or less) $20

Master Stylists

Description Price
Shaving $25
Mens hair cut $60
Shampoo $20
Organic hair color $95

Above, Frank O'Neil is a Master Stylist and cofounder at Barber Avenue.

Products

Product Price
Black top pomade $25
Fiber pomade $20
Free form cream $24
Matte pomade paste $24

It's monday night football and you don't want to miss it. No problem. Come watching it with us. We even give away some chicken wings!

Next -> See proof
posts.plaintext:
Men come to Barber Avenue not only to get a great hair cut, but also to relax
and have fun. It's a place to talk about your projets, your ambitions and to
connect with other ambitious person like you.

Telephone: 514-401-1111

and cofounder  at Barber Avenue.

paste$24

posts.html:
Happy clients are everything to us. Without you guys we would be living on the street (or in our Mom's basement). Thank you so much for trusting us over all those years.

We a are proud to serve Peter Volks since June 2015. He change the world by beeing a Creative Director at Cossette Communication in Montréal.

We a are proud to serve Lilian Pierrick since April 2014. He change the world by beeing a Software Engineer at Ubisoft in Montréal.

We a are proud to serve Hugues Lambert since January 2016. He change the world by beeing a Business Analyst at Bank of Montréal (guess where).

We a are proud to serve Renard Thibault since September 2014. He change the world by beeing a Chef and owner at La Banquise in Montréal.

We a are proud to serve Juste Achille since October 2015. He change the world by beeing a Lead singer in the band The Rock Habilies from Montréal.

We a are proud to serve Jacky Josselin since Fabruary 2014. He change the world by beeing a Carpenter at Depuis Construction in Laval.

We a are proud to serve Aldéric Alex since November 2012. He change the world by beeing a 3D artist at Gameloft in Montréal.

We a are proud to serve Edgard Gérard since Spetember 2014. He change the world by beeing a Painter Edgard Colors in Montréal.

We a are proud to serve David Humbert since March 2015. He change the world by beeing a Accountant at Pratt & Whitney in Montréal.

We a are proud to serve Matthew Dimitri since November 2013. He change the world by beeing a Financial Anaylyst at Bombardier in Montréal.

Next -> About Us

posts.title: About Us
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"We are artist at heart. Not only we are obsessed about perfecting our craft but we aim to be happy in our personal life as well. Frank O'Neil and I, Mark Jolier, first meet in high school about +/- 20 years ago. Things couldn't be better for us. Frank just received a big promotion at work, and has a wonderful marriage with his beautiful wife, Sharon. However, into this idyllic world steps Lisa, a temporary worker at Derek's office. Lisa begins to stalk Derek, jeopardizing all he holds dear. That's when we decided to start our own affair and we never looked back. Telephone: 514-401-1111 ![about-us-chairs-b](/news/content/images/2017/08/about-us-chairs-b.jpg) ### [Next -> Book your next appointment](/news/book-your-next-appointment/)
"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
We are artist at heart. Not only we are obsessed about perfecting our craft but we aim to be happy in our personal life as well.

Frank O'Neil and I, Mark Jolier, first meet in high school about +/- 20 years ago. Things couldn't be better for us. Frank just received a big promotion at work, and has a wonderful marriage with his beautiful wife, Sharon. However, into this idyllic world steps Lisa, a temporary worker at Derek's office. Lisa begins to stalk Derek, jeopardizing all he holds dear.

That's when we decided to start our own affair and we never looked back.

Telephone: 514-401-1111

Next -> Book your next appointment
posts.plaintext:
We are artist at heart. Not only we are obsessed about perfecting our craft but
we aim to be happy in our personal life as well.

Frank O'Neil and I, Mark Jolier, first meet in high school about +/- 20 years
ago. Things couldn't be better for us. Frank just received a big promotion at
work, and has a wonderful marriage with his beautiful wife, Sharon. However,
into this idyllic world steps Lisa, a temporary worker at Derek's office. Lisa
begins to stalk Derek, jeopardizing all he holds dear.

That's when we decided to start our own affair and we never looked back.

Telephone: 514-401-1111



Next -> Book your next appointment [/news/news/book-your-next-appointment/]

posts.title: Our blog is on it's way
posts.mobiledoc:
{"version":"0.3.1","markups":[],"atoms":[],"cards":[["card-markdown",{"cardName":"card-markdown","markdown":"We know we should blog about what we do, share our vision of the world and reflect on stuff but... we are currently too busy serving you. Well actually... if you are (or if you know) a great writter, please let us know, we want to meet you! Ask Frank about this! ### [Next -> See our services](/news/services/)
"}]],"sections":[[10,0]]}
posts.html:
We know we should blog about what we do, share our vision of the world and reflect on stuff but... we are currently too busy serving you.

Well actually... if you are (or if you know) a great writter, please let us know, we want to meet you! Ask Frank about this!

Next -> See our services
posts.plaintext:
We know we should blog about what we do, share our vision of the world and
reflect on stuff but... we are currently too busy serving you.

Oh, actually!

By the way, if you are (or if you know) a great writter, please let us know, we
want to meet you! Ask Frank about this!

Next -> See our services [/news/news/services/]

posts.html:
We’re so glad we got married to haircuts, fun, and creative style five years ago. And you’re invited. Come to our month-long April Anniversary party; we’ll have new ideas, surprises, and offers.

This text is used as a placeholder or a tk note. Words that will follow won't make any sense and this is fine. At the moment, the goal is to build a structure for our site.

It started slowly

Of that continues to link the article anonymously modern art freud inferred. Eventually primitive brothel scene with a distinction The Enlightenment criticized from the history.

From understanding of the day worked either through 1912 analytic. And criticised Vasari's cult of a broader term that the date. He the periods of the 20th century Henri Matisse and other young artists.

See ya soon!
posts.plaintext:
We’re so glad we got married to haircuts, fun, and creative style five years
ago. And you’re invited. Come to our month-long April Anniversary party; we’ll
have new ideas, surprises, and offers.

This text is used as a placeholder or a tk note. Words that will follow won't
make any sense and this is fine. At the moment, the goal is to build a structure
for our site.

It started slowly
Of that continues to link the article anonymously modern art freud inferred.
Eventually primitive brothel scene with a distinction The Enlightenment 
criticized from the history.

From understanding of the day worked either through 1912 analytic. And
criticised Vasari's cult of a broader term that the date. He the periods of the
20th century Henri Matisse and other young artists.

See ya soon!
